release.action: Updated uctx package documentation.
Updated pom.xml to include homenet webdav repository in jar search.
Added the concept of 'session' and added to commands to list sessions and session history.
Added a new constructor that allows creating a string property as read only.
Updated observable list to allow observers which receive superclasses of the list type.
Updated some documentation on rmissl. Added to the qxt package the QxtComboBoxWithTransformation property.
Corrected a bug which prevented acquired entity managers from within entity managers to be released.
When EfwEntityManager methods are invoked, the session is now guaranteed to be flushed.
Added an action synchronizer for combo boxes.
Added support to draw text tables in the AbstractCommand.
The CommandManager now prints the stack trace in case of error in executing a command.
Corrected a bug which prevented correct print of text tables.
Corrected a bug in ActionContextComboBoxSynchronizer which made the syncronizer put in context the value in the combo box and not the object associated with it.
Added some more validations to Ensure.
RmiSslClientSocketFactory is now really serializable and can be sent from the RMI server to clients to create encrypted connections.
Updated documentation on the bpref package.
Corrected a compilation warning in the dmgr, modulebar, polling, qxt and ui packages.
Added support to obtain the data manager of a type of an entity manager (for unit tests).
Added a class that shows error dialogs from exceptions.
Corrected some formatting issues.
Corrected the regex of the QxtDoubleProperty to allow better editing of values.
Added support for property display name change.
QxtTable now allows properties to be added and removed dynamically.
The property listener is attached and detached when properties are added and removed.
Updated incubator eclipse project.
Updated incubtor with some minor changes for Java 7 (JComboBox is now a generic class).
Added MainfestUtil to incubator.
Corrected IconResourceLoader to allow the icon to be read in chunks instead of assuming it would be read in one single read operation.
Corrected some bugs in ManifestUtil (it wasn't working).
Updated incubator to java 7 and Eclipse Juno.
Updated Ensure to correct a bug.
Added directory reader support.
Added stateCondition without message in Ensure.
